title: The Depths of Iteia
content:
The abyssal zone of the Iteian empire. There, hidden away in the cold and dark waters, live those the empire has rejected: disgraced leaders, political enemies, even just those who have nowhere else to live. A powerful barrier protects them from the immense pressure of deep water, but only Fate himself would lead them safely that far to begin with.

The inhabitants of the Depths have long sworn loyalty to Erillen, the so-called Empress of the Depths, who has offered a gentle and warm presence for those once desolate souls to rally under. Given the extent of the Depths, one could say her empire is even larger than Iteia itself.
